. With a population of just over 5,000, Coxen Hole is the largest town on the island of Roatan.
Many tourists arrive by cruise ship. The cruise ship pier is located just west of the center of town. Juan Manuel Gálvez International Airport is located just east of town.
Taxis are abundant around the cruise ship terminal. You can get a driver for the entire day for as low as $25 U.S. per person.
Several duty free shops are located around the cruise ship pier.
